meta_description: Our glass Museum showcases major works of contemporary American and International art by founding and leading artists in the field of studio glass and art expression.
hours_text:
World Collection Of Glass Art 

We INSPIRE by showcasing the creativity of  
artists who work in glass from around the world.

[PLAN YOUR VISIT ](https://www.imaginemuseum.com/plan-your-visit/) World Collection Of Glass Art 

We UPLIFT with the visual experience one has when  
walking through the Museum and encountering  
the astounding beauty intrinsic in the collection.

[PLAN YOUR VISIT ](https://www.imaginemuseum.com/plan-your-visit/) World Collection Of Glass Art 

We EDUCATE by building awareness of the artists,  
their creativity and the amazing properties and  
transformative nature of this seemingly  
simple material: glass.

[PLAN YOUR VISIT ](https://www.imaginemuseum.com/plan-your-visit/)
